pullrequest.title: parse urdf files to sdf 1.5 instead of 1.4 to avoid use_parent_model_frame

content.raw:
> And sorry to ask a dumb question, but exactly was the axis before, and what was it after? \(it’s not immediately apparent to me what “wrong axis” implies…\)  
> Could you post a complete \(but minimal\) repro of the issue, if possible?

To be honest I don’t know as I did not had access to the failing model. What I guess is that the “wrong axis” was the axis oriented as in the joint frame \(to comply with 1.5\) but that is interpreted as expressed in the model frame \(to comply with the parent 1.4 model\). As we now entered the freeze period of sdformat \(see [https://community.gazebosim.org/t/important-gazebo-and-ignition-are-going-to-github/533](https://community.gazebosim.org/t/important-gazebo-and-ignition-are-going-to-github/533)\) I can’t open an issue, but after that I can open a proper issue.
